useCase.name: Access and Adjust Privacy Settings
useCase.description: User can access and adjust privacy and data settings.

preconditions.precondition: User requests to access privacy settings.

useCase.trigger: User requests to access or adjust privacy settings.

mainSequence.step: User requests to access privacy settings.
Settings retrieve current settings from Storage.
Storage returns current settings to Settings.
Settings display current privacy settings to GUI.
GUI shows privacy settings options to User.
User adjusts privacy and data settings.
GUI updates settings as per User's request.
Settings save new settings to Storage.
Storage confirms new settings are saved.
GUI displays success message to User.
